newsitem.title: SWEDEN: Ericsson says wins 1.2 bln SKR China order.
newsitem.headline: Ericsson says wins 1.2 bln SKR China order.

text.p: Swedish telecoms group LM Ericsson AB said on Friday it won an order worth 1.2 billion crowns for a fixed public telecoms network in the Guangdong province of China.
Ericsson said in a statement the order was from the Guangdong Post and Telecommunications Administration (GPTA).

The order included AXE switching equipment, ISDN equipment, Intelligent Network (IN) products, broad-band multi-media communication network products, services and training, Ericsson spokesman Per Zetterquist told Reuters.
Deliveries are due to be completed by 1999, the company said.
